# clickhouse_organization_settings (Resource)

You can use the *clickhouse_organization_settings* resource to manage organization-level settings in ClickHouse Cloud.

~> **Note:** This resource manages settings for the organization configured in the provider. Only one instance of this resource should exist per organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "clickhouse_organization_settings" "org_settings" {
  core_dumps_enabled = true
}
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "clickhouse_organization_settings" "this" {
  # Enable core dumps collection for services in the organization
  core_dumps_enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `core_dumps_enabled` (Boolean) Whether core dumps collection is enabled for services in the organization. Defaults to the organization's current setting if not specified.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the organization. This is set automatically from the provider configuration.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
#!/bin/bash
# The organization settings resource can be imported using the organization ID
terraform import clickhouse_organization_settings.this xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx
```
